replies.body: Sorry, but that Darius nerf is still not going to be enough to make him 'Less OP'. Not sure if you have noticed Rito, but he's 100% banned basically right now. This will not change because of this supposed 'Nerf'
Fucking agreeeed His new q which now restores 36% health ._. Is just Bull shit
yea, but he needs to hit 3 champs instead of 2. It will lower his sustain in lane with a return on 12% from 15% per champ
I shall just play mid instead of top for a while xc
lol. Just play trundle. hue
I totally agree with that, increasing his maximum heal and increasing the cost of mana isn't gonna help to reduce his late game potential
I'm super happy about the Recall animations in ARAM now i can show of my River Spirit {{champion:267}}  recall!! Or show off the new Championship {{champion:429}} recall cause that looks super sick
please remove mordekaiser from the game

please make a side quest for soraka and ww, if ww kills soraka 3 time in a row (assists dont count) he turns human with some kind of buff, but if soraka kills him (assists counted) in a row she gains a stronger healing buff or something.
Riot, why you take away my {{champion:86}} revenge quests?

I know, you guys should lower the cool down on {{champion:25}} Dark Binding to 3 seconds and make the snare/stun last 4 seconds instead of making it cost less mana, i mean {{champion:53}}  grab is still 100 mana and threshs hook is about the same, yeh i  know its no comparison but them sort of spells are game changes if u land them

You want the cool down on her Dank Binding to 3 seconds and the snare to last 4 seconds? So you can snare them every 3 seconds? so other champs have no way to ever escape it? A 4 seconds snare would ruin League man, even a 2 second snare like Elise's can change a teamfight completely.
I'm pretty sure it's a bad case of misguided, unfunny sarcasm.

it was, and that's what i tended it to be, just that mana drop on her Q slightly annoyed me, just because they have NEVER changed the duration of her snare, i mean if they were to nerf her in the future, please start with that Q dropping it from 2, 2.25, 2.5, 2.75, 3 (80, 135, 190, 245, 300 +90% AP) to something like 1.5, 1.75, 2, 2.25, 2.5 (90, 150, 200, 250, 320 + 70% AP)
The mana drop on her Q is a **buff** not a **nerf** because Morgana is weak?

Not that weak IF you get people playing her as support with full AP runes and masteries and building full AP items with CDR and Mana Regen, just a crappy "buff/nerf" what everl it was meant to be, like Blitzcranks Q is still 100 mana at lv 1, 3 fail grabs means no mana for him, why not "buff" that as well drop it to like 75 mana or something

Morgana is currently weak, this is why she is getting buffed.
How often do you see her ingame? compared to Blitzcrank for example.
And there is a very clear difference between Morgana's Snare and Blitzcrank's hook.
Speed, hitbox as well as what they actually do (wow).

THE POWER OF IMAGINATION Fixed a visual bug where Jarvan's Passive - Martial Cadence empowered autoattacks were sometimes not playing an animation

I liked to call the death stare. Good to know it was actually a bug and I wasn't me just going nuts.
{{champion:59}}<LOL)
we want {{champion:19}} update rito pls
yeh man a new splash art would be nice

**Riot please**, fix the {{champion:106}}  bug. It has been over a year and the bug still has not been fixed {{champion:106}}. It really hurts my early clear speeds in the jungle, especially in ranked. It doesn't always reduce the cooldown by half for his W when I bite a monster when it's meant to.

Will there also be an update where we are able to see the green colour on a stat during in-game? with all the same colours, its difficult to read what has been increase and what hasnt been and trust me... id rather not click the champion then move my cursor towards the desire icon to read if its been increased or not :/
{{champion:21}} can you`s please look into fixing miss fortunes ult as sometimes its fine then other times it glitches... thanks

I feel like warrior needs some more love. All the other enchantments have their unique passives but warrior is pretty much youmuus without the active i think it would be really good with the old spirit of the elder lizard burn passive
